owner_type.description: The owner type of an email
The owner type of a phone number
The owner type of the address

email_address.description: The email address of the contact

phone_number.description: The phone number of the contact

remote_id.description: The id of the contact in the context of the 3rd Party

first_name.description: The first name of the contact

last_name.description: The last name of the contact

email_addresses.description: The email addresses of the contact

phone_numbers.description: The phone numbers of the contact

user_id.description: The uuid of the user who owns the contact

remote_id.description: The id of the deal in the context of the Crm 3rd Party
The id of the note in the context of the Crm 3rd Party

The id of the task in the context of the Crm 3rd Party

email_address.description: The email address of the user

teams.description: The teams whose the user is part of

remote_id.description: The id of the user in the context of the 3rd Party

due_date.description: The date the ticket is due

parent_ticket.description: The uuid of the parent ticket

tags.description: The tags names of the ticket

completed_at.description: The date the ticket has been completed

assigned_to.description: The users uuids the ticket is assigned to

comment.description: The users uuids the ticket is assigned to

account_id.description: The uuid of the account which the ticket belongs to

contact_id.description: The uuid of the contact which the ticket belongs to
